name: Tokikake
text: DON!! x1 If you have 4 or less cards in your hand, this character cannot be K.O'd in battle

effect.text: If you have 4 or less cards in your hand, this character cannot be K.O'd in battle

meta.notes: Card marked as SAMPLE, but rarity is R based on printed text. Power is 3000, not 3000 as printed in the top right corner. Life is not printed.
